summary: Diff adds a Motoko backend actor with signup/admin APIs and a React frontend with routes, auth guards, admin list/detail pages, and a themed layout. However, stable persistence for signups and the required generated brand images are not evidenced, and student “view submitted profile” UI is not confirmable from the provided diff summary. Several extra features (user profile setup, caffeine referral footer, secret-token-based access control init) appear beyond the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Store student signups in stable state so they persist across canister upgrades/restarts.
missing_requirements.reason: backend/main.mo uses in-memory Maps and a var nextId without any stable variables or preupgrade/postupgrade handling shown; no migration.mo is added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Student can view the details of their submitted signup after submitting (at least the fields they entered).
missing_requirements.reason: Backend has getMySignups and frontend hook useGetMySignups exists, and a StudentProfilePage route is declared, but the diff summary does not include the StudentProfilePage implementation to confirm it renders the submitted signup details.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate and include static brand images under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the landing page (logo and hero), referenced as static assets.
missing_requirements.reason: No generated image files or any references to frontend/public/assets/generated are shown in the diff summary; landing page implementation is not included in the provided file list.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile model and forced profile setup modal (name capture) before using the app.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask for user profiles or mandatory profile setup; only II auth UI and student signup/admin panel are required.

hallucinated_features.description: Secret-token based access control initialization via URL parameter caffeineAdminToken.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specifies admin principals but does not request a secret-token bootstrap mechanism or URL-parameter based admin enablement.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer with 'Built with caffeine.ai' referral link.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by BuildRequest; adds external promotional link/UI.
